text: Dolgaec () is a village in the municipality of Dolneni, North Macedonia. The population of the village was massacred in the First World War, by the occupying Ottoman Army. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 70 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 97. *Macedonians 70 ==References== Category:Villages in Dolneni Municipality
title: Dolgaec
